channel.title: CVE Feed for Century Systems Co., Ltd. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Century Systems Co., Ltd. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-36491|2024-07-17T08:50:11.777Z -- century%20systems%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- futurenet%20nxr-1300%20series
item.description: FutureNet NXR series, VXR series and WXR series provided by Century Systems Co., Ltd. allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary OS command, obtain and/or alter sensitive information, and be able to cause a denial of service (DoS) condition.

item.title: CVE-2024-31070|2024-07-17T08:47:22.506Z -- century%20systems%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- futurenet%20nxr-1300%20series
item.description: Initialization of a resource with an insecure default vulnerability in FutureNet NXR series, VXR series and WXR series provided by Century Systems Co., Ltd. allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to access telnet service unlimitedly.

item.title: CVE-2024-36475|2024-07-17T08:48:33.524Z -- century%20systems%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- futurenet%20nxr-1300%20series
item.description: FutureNet NXR series, VXR series and WXR series provided by Century Systems Co., Ltd. contain an active debug code vulnerability. If a user who knows how to use the debug function logs in to the product, the debug function may be used and an arbitrary OS command may be executed.
